name: Bastard's Pet
description:
A simple roguelike developed for the 2019 7DRL challenge.

Unable to complete in the 7 Days. Basic dungeon, FOV, and bump attacks working. Enemy and Ally AI broken.

A two-timing, backstabbing, klutz of a rogue has just gone to explore the dungeon. Unlucky bastard. Too bad they own you.

Play as the lovable animal companion that every adventure seeking bastard in the world takes into the dungeon with them.

  • PERMADEATH
  • Turn-based
